description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a schedule screen, displaying weekly schedules with tab navigation, handling loading states, errors, and rendering schedule cards.

classes.name: ScheduleScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a weekly schedule with tab navigation

classes.name: _ScheduleScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the ScheduleScreen, including tab control, data loading, and UI rendering

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes TabController and triggers schedule loading

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of TabController when widget is removed

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main UI, including AppBar, TabBarView, and FloatingActionButton

methods.name: _buildScheduleCard
methods.description: Builds a card widget to display individual schedule entries

methods.name: _showAddScheduleDialog
methods.description: Shows a placeholder SnackBar for adding new schedules
